reviews.review_text: I am hearing impaired and wear hearing aids but not when I'm sleeping. This alarm clock has an adjustable volume control and at the loudest level, it's VERY loud. It also has a vibrating disk that can be put under your pillow. I can't feel it under my pillow when I'm sleeping but the vibration does wake me up. I would highly recommend this alarm clock to others with hearing impairments. The vibrating disk component makes it a great purchase for those who are deaf.

I've had a Sonic Boom clock for over 10 years and can't recommend it highly enough! For hard of hearing people who have trouble hearing the sound of a regular alarm clock using the vibrator under your pillow is a perfect solution.
Works perfectly. Just as it was described when I purchased. Very loud and bed shaker is powerful. If this alarm doesn't wake you up, then you must be in a coma, lol. Thanks Collin.

reviews.title: Loud enough
reviews.review_text: Got this clock for my mother as her other ‚Äúloud‚Äù alarm clocks were not loud enough for her level of hearing loss. Lots of options of sounds - even a person yelling. Works great for my mom.

reviews.title: Does the deed when your most in need..
reviews.review_text: Hard to get me up.. This thing will rock your world. Although the vibration of this is equal or less than that of a jumbo jet full of pink elephant's its still enough to take care of the task at hand. I give it an A+ for even the Deepest of slumber-ears.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.review_text: Really great alarm clock. Can be really loud. My one and only issue is it came with no manual. There are several other features the clock have that the instruction manual tells you so I had to start YouTubing. Probably want to make sure each box has a manual and all good from there. Thanks üòä

reviews.title: degree of loudness
reviews.review_text: It was not as loud as a jackhammer but I realize now that it is sufficiently loud enough to wake me up. It is also easy to understand the instructions and set both alarms---I'm very pleased with the design and ease of setting the alarms. Now I just hope the clock is durable. It appears to be sturdily built and now time will tell!

reviews.title: effective alarm
reviews.review_text: Pretty pleased with this product, except the buttons to set the alarm and time are time-consuming as you have to hold down the button through 23.5 hours of time to set your alarm half an hour earlier. Also, it isn't as loud as my other alarm clock, but the vibration option makes it more effective.

Decently loud but not for true DEEP sleepers. Granted it is louder than any other alarm clock I've had, but it does not live up to its claims. It is loud enough to make me hit the snooze after ten to fifteen rings but not nearly loud enough to scare me awake like so many people say. If anything the bed shaker annoys me awake. Kudos though to the designers for making the buttons out of sharp plastic spikes. I seriously doubt the 113 dB rating. It will do until I find another truly loud alarm clock.
Could not get the clock set up... very very difficult! My husband tried and couldn't either...ended up throwing it away! Total waste of time and money!!!

reviews.title: Great for hard to wake up teenagers!
reviews.review_text: My college bound son has always been very difficult to wake wake up for school. A traditional alarm clock did not work for him. Even with the volume very loud, it only woke up the rest of the house. This alarm wakes him up and he does not even have the sound option turned on, the vibration alone wakes him up! He places the vibrating disk under his mattress and it works very time. I wish I had found this alarm years ago.

reviews.title: You'll wake, Guaranteed
reviews.review_text: After reading the reviews on this alarm clock i got all excited because i am most definitely a heavy sleeper and have a hard time getting up. Unfortunately the clock doesn't automatically reset itself if you lay back down but that is on me. The Buzz on the alarm is able to be set at different tones and you can set it to which you find most annoying. It has 4 options when setting the alarm to go off: Buzz, Buzz/Vibrate, Vibrate, and Off. The Vibrate feature itself will wake you up. When i first set up the clock it was sitting in the floor across the room and just the violent buzzing from the vibrate feature woke me up. This morning i woke up to just the Vibrate going off when i stuck it under my mattress. I really just wanted to test this out because of the people that referred me to it... (Including my boss) I've had the clock for about a month now and it hasn't failed to wake me up yet. :)

reviews.title: It's okay
reviews.review_text: I have two areas of concern with this alarm clock. First, it is not as loud as I was expecting or desiring it to be. The name implies it will be an extremely loud alarm and it just isn't. It is what I'd describe as fairly loud, but not really loud. The whole reason we are buying it is to wake our daughter who sleeps through just about anything. This alarm not being nearly loud as implied, barely wakes her after several minutes and with the vibrator under her pillow. So I'd say it is okay and barely satisfactory, but was hoping for a little more "boom." My second concern is the connectors for the power and vibrator are not crisp. They loosely plug in to the back of the clock and I am worried over time they will begin to fall out easily but only time will tell. I would have much preferred a snug fit for these connectors. If I could give it a 3.5 and a maybe recommend, I probably would, but I like to err on the positive side, so I gave it a 4 and recommend.

reviews.title: More than what I was looking for
reviews.review_text: The alarm clock has multiple settings that you can use to assist you in getting up. You can not only adjust the volume but the tone of the alarm. The red colors of the numbers can also be dimmed or brightened which is useful. The only reason I gave it 4 out of 5 Stars was that the bed shaker didn't really shake the bed very much. However when it fell on the floor the other night and went off in the morning it made such a racket it definitely woke me up so the bed shaker is now located on the floor!

reviews.title: A bit expensive but works for hard sleepers
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product because both my SO and I are very deep sleepers with a tendency to snooze/turn off alarms while we are still asleep. With this alarm clock, we do not have that issue. Loudness: Not as loud as advertised (said to be the same decibels as a jackhammer) but close. Alarm tones: Very adjustable. Dials on the side let you change tone/pitch and volume Bed shaker: Excellent! I expected this to be weak and ineffective but this is probably the best feature of the product as it is very strong and is enough to wake even the deepest sleeper without the alarm. Price: This is the turn off for me. I was worried that I would spend more than $30 on a product that didn't work. It is expensive, but ultimately worth it as it means not losing jobs through being tardy constantly.

reviews.title: It was all too involved for me..
reviews.review_text: Well, it's a nice looking product. Probably works very well. To make it work I am 82 years old and it was all too difficult for me. it back in the box and I'm gonna give it to somebody. Am not sending any pictures because I got it in the box already and I am not taking it out.

reviews.title: it works. dont be late again.
reviews.review_text: This Sonic Bomb alarm clock will wake you up. one way or another it will wake you up. either by sound(loud), vibration(under pillow) or the flashing red leds. If this clock doesn't wake you up ; you might need the coroner.

reviews.title: Sonic Bomb is the bomb.
reviews.review_text: Vibrating action works well, you place it under the mattress. Because of my scumbag neighbor I have to wear earplugs, so I don't use the buzzer.

reviews.title: an alarm that will wake the dead!
reviews.review_text: I like the fact that the sound volume is adjustable; can be loud enough to wake even the deepest sleeper, as well as shaking or vibrating the bed to wake a person.

reviews.title: Works as Intended
reviews.review_text: As someone who can sleep through anything short of artillery fire, I can confirm this alarm gets the job done well enough. First time in a long time I've actually been able to wake up to an alarm.

reviews.title: Teenage Ears
reviews.review_text: I brought this clock for my 13 year old son; who has an attitude when I wake him in the morning. I'm tried of talking and being in a bad mood so I found thus loud clock . My mornings are better but his is loud.

reviews.title: Great alarm clock for the hard of hearing.
reviews.review_text: This is a good alarm clock for the person that is hard of hearing, or for people that are very heavy sleepers. Its very loud and the vibrator is good also.

reviews.title: Not product pictured.
reviews.review_text: The product that i received is not what I bought pictured. This clock was supposed to have both the hour and minute buttons but the one I received does not. As you can see I even added photos each of which was pictured by the company and the one I received.
The instructions were NOT easy to read and weren't compatible with the item.
This product had a price that was the same as other locations but came at the advertised time.

reviews.title: I was doubtful but this thing really works!
reviews.review_text: I didn't think this would wake me up (I sleep through fire alarms) but the bed shaker really works! I still end up hitting the snooze button, but now no one else in my house is woken up. The flashing lights and being able to set the audio alarm volume and tone are also nice features.

reviews.title: Awesome volume, but shaker could be more effective
reviews.review_text: As someone who has sleep apnoea, and is a very deep sleeper in general, this is a Godsend. This is the first alarm clock I've ever found that I cannot sleep through, no matter what. While I'm disappointed with the bed-shaker to some degree, I'm overall very satisfied. At first, I was very impressed when the bedshaker, upon testing on a tabletop, was doing multiple flips, and seemed very strong. However, when it came to practical application (slid under the mattress, or under my pillow) it was less effective. When I think of a bedshaker, I think of something that actually moves the bed. I've been known to sleep through earthquakes and thunderstorms that threaten to break the windows. A small vibration just isn't enough to make a dent for me. By itself, it would never do what is needed, but in combination with the beep, it is fairly effective as a boost. Being aware that I've been known to smack an alarm clock off while still asleep, I was very glad to see the long cord, both for the main power plug, and for the bedshaker. I was able to place it far enough from my bed that I actually have to get up in order to turn it off, thus reducing the chance I'll fall back asleep after it shuts off. The duration of the beeps is also a plus in this regard. Overall, I would recommend this product to anyone who has ever had difficulty waking in the morning.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: I'm one of those people that has a hard time going to sleep and then when I do it's a crash which makes it hard for me to get up. I e tried everything out there but when I say this thing is by far amazing I mean it. And with all the differ t options, adjustable tone, 1 or 2 alarms, volume, just sound alarm, just vibrated alarm, both it's just amazing all in all I wish I would of gotten one sooner! Highly recommended for anyone hard of hearing or deep heavy sleepers! great for all ages just be mindful of you scare easy bc this thing will make you jolt up and think there's a fire in the house it's so loud! If this doesn't work for you then you need a amp or air compressor with a train horn and timer!
i have hearing loss in both ears and this is the only alarm clock i can actually hear

reviews.title: Sleeper.
reviews.review_text: Excellent product...does exactly what it says it does.

reviews.title: Solution for husband who sleeps through alarms!
reviews.review_text: My husband is very hard to wake up with an alarm clock and this is the only one we've tried that wakes him up!

reviews.title: Great Alarm clock!!
reviews.review_text: Two weeks in a row! Yes, I do believe this is the best clock for any hard sleeping people! Especially teens that can't seem to get to bed at night!
To change the tone is really nice, the shaker puts off brand shakers to Shame. The first night it scared me and my dog awake it's loud as F@%26K.. if it can wake me up instantly that's a real feat

i so love this alarm clock! my nephew sleeps hard and ive been tired of waking him up for work. gave this to he and his wife as a wedding gift! its awesone! fantastic and he's always up and to work on time! thank you for this great product!
it is a gift for my son i am sure he will be able to get up and go to work

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: I wear hearing aids and can't hear the alarm in the morning. The bed shaker works beautifully to wake me. The flashing lights are great in the winter, not so much in the summer.

bought 2 for my kids one works awsome the other one we have to reset 1-2 times a week. we put a backup battery for the one we have issues with so not sure if that did something to it. but the vibration and the sound are very loud

reviews.title: Gets the job done!
reviews.review_text: This clock was purchased to replace my original Sonic Boom. Its made differently so it will take some getting used to but it works. I do not hear well at all but between the vibrator, flashing lights and noise it makes it does the job of waking me up which is the goal!

reviews.title: SUPER ALARM
reviews.review_text: My old alarm clock radio crashed. I tried 2 other alarm clocks plus one other clock radio. I have a hearing problem and even though these products were loud, I could not hear them when I removed my hearing aids. I finally found this sonic boom and hoped it would help. This product will wake the dead!. The several controls that it has can be adjusted to any ones need. The alarm sounds are pretty loud, but when you combine the alarm sounds, flashing lights, and vibrator, it will wake the dead. I doubt that any one would be able to hit the snooze after the alarm went off. Excellent product for the required results.

reviews.title: It is the bomb!
reviews.review_text: This thing wakes my son up, he was constantly late for work and I would also be late for work. After a few day of this set up right and he is up before I wake him up and ready to go on time. I highly suggest this product for anyone who sleeps through a regular alarm.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: I bought this alarm clock for my boyfriend. Before this alarm clock he would always be late for work because his old alarm clock couldn't wake him up. This alarm clock definitely wakes him up now. I'm really glad I found this for him. The only reason why this isn't 5 stars is because the vibrating piece isn't that strong when put under a pillow. If you lay it on the floor it's much louder and bounces around everywhere.

reviews.title: The best alarm clock I've ever owned!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this alarm clock for my husband and I in January. I have always been a very deep sleeper and my husband was working a lot of hours and was having a hard time waking up in the mornings. We put the vibrating "bed shaker" under our mattress and it works great. The vibration of the bed shaker makes some noise when the alarm comes on so the combination of the bed shaker, the noise it makes , and the alarm wakes us up every time. My friend has this alarm clock and she has her bed shaker in the drawer of her nightstand and she says it is very loud.

reviews.title: It's Effective!
reviews.review_text: It works at getting my teenage boy out of bed on his own. Of course I also hear it, even down the hallway through two closed doors. The high pitch setting sounds like a hotel fire alarm, but you can lower the pitch. The vibrator disc under the mattress is a must to waken teens. If one alarm is not enough ‚Äî you can set the clock for two different times, so my son has a back-up.

reviews.title: Great Alarm for Deep Sleepers
reviews.review_text: OMG!! We got the alarm and plugged it in. We placed the vibrating puck on the counter next to the clock. We set the clock and alarm easily. A few minutes later the alarm went off, it was very loud, the LED lights flashed, and the vibrating puck jumped off the counted 8". It was amazing!! My 18yo son who has slept through every alarm, doesn't sleep through this one.

reviews.title: Jumped out of bed like I had been shot. it works
reviews.review_text: I have always had trouble hearing alarms. I can hear my kids wake up in middle of night or morning, but an alarm I never could. I seen this ad for this and I just had to try it. It has 2 different alarms on it. So we set it for my husband first, since he has to be up and gone for work before I need to be up. IT WOKE ME UP. and that was with the vibrating thing on his side. When he got up he switched it to the 2nd alarm and slid the vibrating thing under my pillow. 2 hours later, it went off and I JUMPED UP LIKE I HAD BEEN SHOT. Im a zombie and it worked. I didn't believe it would but it did. Where it's on my husband's side of bed, I had no choice to get up to turn it off or snooze it. After getting startled like that. I had no intentions of snoozing. So yes this works. it's worth the money. Buy it now.

reviews.title: It Does The Job
reviews.review_text: I've always been waking up (or trying to wake) with the alarm on my phone but it has failed time and time again. So this was the first alarm clock that I bought. To be honest, I was expecting something extremely loud that I would jump out of my bed in fear from. But in all reality, it's just a little louder than a normal alarm clock. It does the job though. I've been waking up every morning with it. I haven't needed to try the bed shaking feature yet so I can't really comment on that. I would recommend this to someone to try out. It should do the job!

reviews.title: Great to wake the dead.
reviews.review_text: I purchased this alarm for my daughter. She has a sleeping disorder and has a big problem waking up on time in the mornings. The family would take turns calling her in the morning and sometimes we would be on the phone 45min to 1 hour trying to wake her up. She was even given a warning at her work for being late. So my daughter showed my the Youtube site on this clock and I was sold. This clock has a vibrate pad that you put under the mattress, flashes lights in your eyes and has an incredibly loud alarm which can be set to different sounds. The only thing it doesn't do is slap you in the face to wake you up. Incredible alarm and would highly recommend it to anyone with problems of waking up in the morning. My daughter hasn't been late one time since she hooked this gismo up. Thankful DAD.

reviews.title: My son finally woke up!
reviews.review_text: It took my 20 year old autistic son a few tries to get the alarm set and the buttons figured out. I think any kid used to today's electronics would struggle with using buttons like these. But otherwise, this is the first time he has actually woke up on time in years without someone having to make him get up. I highly recommend this for heavy sleepers!

reviews.title: It works
reviews.review_text: If this clock does not wake you up someone needs to call the undertaker!

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review_text: Bought this clock for my son at college and so far so good. Works great

reviews.title: The clock that will work your a up nice
reviews.review_text: There are no dislikes about it. Very likable. Thank you

reviews.title: Does the job!
reviews.review_text: Works great! Bought it for my son that is a terror to wake... no more! Very loud and the vibrating pad does much betterthan I thought it would!

works wonderful have had it since 2016.my neighbor hears it in his house and wakes him for work and there is a little bit of distance apart.the vibration is what wakes me.diffently load gives husband a heart attack everyday.

reviews.title: Great item!
reviews.review_text: Love love love this clock! My daughter is hearing impaired, and the clock really work at waking her up, the vibrations and the very loud sound that wake us all up, is great for her. We love it! It Works!

reviews.title: Does what it says it's going to do
reviews.review_text: Not a cheap product. Well made. So loud it wakes up the whole house and the vibrations and buzzing under bed wakes up my son too. Great for a teenage boy that's a very very hard sleeper!!

reviews.title: Works Well
reviews.review_text: This clock should get the deepest sleeper awake in lieu of dynamite!! Dual alarm is a great function as well as battery back-up of time and alarm settings.

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.review_text: this clock can give you a heart attack great for deep sleepers like my husband üòçüòçüòç the bed shaker we put into the bed's drawer and is super annoyed, if this alarm doesn't woke you up you should find a exorcist to wake your body

reviews.title: NEVER Sleep thru the Alarm Again
reviews.review_text: I wasn't hearing my alarm in the morning, the dog would hear it and wake me up. This alarm is EXTRA LOUD and I don't even have it set on the loudest volume. If you want to you can set it to sound the alarm and vibrate the bed. Both work GREAT! I thought it was expensive, but since I've heard it and used it, it's well worth the cost. I'll never be able to sleep thru the alarm anymore. I recommend this for anyone who is hard of hearing.

reviews.title: Good product for a good price
reviews.review_text: Shaker works amazingly. It was more than enough to rattle my bones awake. For a completely deaf person like I am, the alarm sound probably won√¢¬Ä¬ôt wake you up. I couldnt hear the alarm but the bed shaker is all I needed to be woken up. I would reccomend it to anyone who is a heavy sleeper or a deaf person.

reviews.title: sonic boom indeed
reviews.review_text: This is the loudest alarm clock I've ever owned. It is a plug in with a bed shaker attachment. I tend to awake up before it goes off as I literally jump out of bed when it goes off. I am a LITTLE hearing impaired and have gone thru several types of alarm clock. If you sleep through this somebody better call the coroner cause you are DEAD.

reviews.title: Top notch alarm clock
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my mom and she has slept better since having it. She couldnt hear her other alarm and was worried about over sleeping and would wake up periodically through the night and now she sleeps all night. Highly recommend for anyone that has hearing problems

reviews.title: No doubt in my mind it WILL wake you up.
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a long time for an exceptionally loud alarm clock as I am hard of hearing. The Sonic Alert Boom Alarm totally exceeded my expectations. As a test I set it for mid afternoon and forgot about it. It went off when I was on the other side of the house and I could definitely hear it. When you are sleeping and it goes off it will knock your socks off. Fortunately you can dial down the loudness. Don't even think of searching for something better as their is nothing better. This is it, there is nothing better. A definite five star recommendation from me especially if you are hard of hearing. Go for it.

reviews.title: A must for sound sleepers!
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my 18 year old son who is a VERY sound sleeper and it works! It wakes him and the vibrating feature is fantastic! His friend told him about this alarm clock before I got it for him and his friend likes his too! All in all, a great product that I would recommend to anyone that has a hard time waking to regular alarm clocks. And a great value at Walmart.

reviews.title: That little extra "nudge"!
reviews.review_text: My son was struggling to get up for his college classes. He didn't want to irritate his roommate with the loud alarm, so he just uses the vibrating disc in his pillow and it does the trick! This clock is perfect for the heavy sleeper who can't get up.

This does wake you up and get you out of bed, i sometimes sleep through alarms but i don't think that's possible with this one, i do use the snooze button as i can't seem to just jump out of bed, i'm not a morning person!! I have not used the super shaker yet, but i will try that soon to see how that works!! I would say if you need a loud alarm to wake you up, then this is definately it!!

reviews.title: Very effective
reviews.review_text: Very loud. Plus it comes with a vibrating disc. My husband had the bright idea to put the vibrating disc between 2 metal bowls on the dresser. Daggum near gave me a heart attack. My idea was to put the disc on the headboard bed post so it would vibrate off and knock him in he head to wake him up in the morning. He was less than receptive to that idea. But the alarm is very loud and we ended up putting the disc between our very thick memory foam mattress and we can both still feel it. It definitely wakes us up in the morning. Best alarm we've ever bought.

reviews.title: Workswell
reviews.review_text: This clock woke up my son who can usually sleep through any alarm. The vibration he said really was strong and he placed it under his pillow for the best result. He wished it had a radio but I don't care about a radio as long as I don't have to shake to wake him myself. Good product!

reviews.title: Great for people with hearing loss
reviews.review_text: If you or someone else are hard of hearing, this clock is for you. Most alarm clocks are a high pitch sound that people with hearing losses cannot hear. This clock is the answer. If a person is deaf, it comes with a vibrating pad that can go under the pillow. Love this clock!

reviews.title: Best clock ever
reviews.review_text: I have been having problems with not hearing my alarms or simply sleeping straight through them and having to rush like crazy to get to work on time. My daughter recommended this clock (she has one too). The setup is super simple and the vibration box works wonderfully. I sleep better knowing that I am not going to oversleep --- best purchase I ever made!

reviews.title: Great alarm
reviews.review_text: This thing gets me out of bed before I can even think straight. It's very loud and the vibrating option works fantastic. The lights don't really do much, but a good touch if you need visuals to wake you up. Having the ability to set 2 different alarms is nice also.

reviews.title: No one will sleep through this alarm!
reviews.review_text: Lots of room for personal adjustments, i.e. pitch and volume. Intuitive set up. The only minor criticism is that if you go past the setup time for time or alarm you've got to go all the way around 24 hours to set the desired time instead of having a reverse button to go back a few minutes. It is not so bad since the clock has a fast and slow forward adjust mode. If you need a LOUD alarm clock this is the baby.

reviews.title: Sonic Bomb is a great name for this
reviews.review_text: I am a cochlear implant wearer and when I am not wearing them I cannot hear alarms. This has lights that flash, a bed shaker and it buzzes. I definately needed this and I am so glad I purchased this one. I use to rely on my dogs waking me up when they hear the alarm, now I can get up on my own because of the bed shaker and I wake up the dogs now.....(sweet revenge). If you are hard of hearing or deaf, this is a must have.

reviews.title: Better than a cell phne
reviews.review_text: This is the best alarm clock that I have ever had, but a little bit more than I wanted to spend. Not only does it have an ultra loud buzzer, but it also shakes the bed like crazy. I also enjoy the fact you can adjust the snooze time and the duration of the alarm.

I wear hearing aids in both ears and am deaf when they are out. The clock has a beep you can set high pitch. low pitch or in between. It also has flashing red lights and comes with a bed shaker to put under your pillow. It also has a snooze button you can program for different lengths of time. With my hearing loss it is great to be able to get up in the morning with the help of this clock!

reviews.title: Great product.
reviews.review_text: I love this sonic clock. My grandson has autism and I have been having a problem trying to potty train him at night and his doctor recommended that I should get one of these bed wetting alarm clock and it only took me about 4days to fully get him potty trained at night. He was already potty durning the day.

reviews.title: This Sonic Alert Bomb Clock will wake you up!
reviews.review_text: This clock does the job! I even have used it for a timer. Sometimes, I wear headphones on the computer and get so involved in what I'm doing I can't hear a normal timer. The add feature of a vibrator disk can be tucked into the side of the chair or placed on the desk. No more burnt rice! :)

reviews.title: So many wasted years looking and not buying this.
reviews.review_text: I love... love ..... LOVE this clock! I'm a life long heavy sleeper. My family jokes that i can sleep through anything. Well, I have to work and many times have had to rely on them waking me. This clock changed the game. Waste no more time and get this alarm system. Fair warning though the vibration disk is amped up. It will definitely wake you.

reviews.title: Terrible reliability!
reviews.review_text: This Clock did not operate. Opened package, everything looked fine. Set time and alarm one day. Tested Fine! The next morning, clock alarm never sounded. Investigated to discover only 3 red lights visible - not time - no display. Attempted to get display back unsuccessfully. I immediately returned to nearest Walmart.

reviews.title: Works extremely well
reviews.review_text: Easy to read at night. The shaker does the job. Even with only 40% hearing in one ear and 60% in the other there is no need for the audible alarm. The only complaint is that the back up battery attachment apparently has a broken wire. The B/U battery will not operate. I had to leave quickly on a trip and did not have the time to wait for a new one to be shipped out. Other than that, I would recommend this item

reviews.title: It really really works!
reviews.review_text: I bought this for a hearing impaired friend who has had trouble getting up on time. They also have a tendency to fall back to sleep. Now they wake up on time and stay awake. The the clock is easy to set and adjust. The shaker is very strong. I like that the clock also has LED lights that flash when the alarm goes off. The clock also has an audible alarm that can be used. The volume of the audio alarm can be adjusted from very low to very loud. It has a very nice test mode feature which came in handy for setting up the unit. I also used it to show my friend what to expect when the alarm goes off. In case of a power outage, it has battery backup to keep the time. I don't think the alarm part will function if it is only running on the battery. The battery was not included so you should plan on getting one when you purchase this clock. Overall, I am very pleased with the product and I expect to get many years of use from it.

reviews.title: Life saving alarm clock
reviews.review_text: This alarm clock saved my job! I was having trouble getting up for work and it got to the point that I got written up and was told I would be fired if I continued to be late. I bought this alarm clock and never again have I slept through my alarm. This thing does its job the way an alarm clock should. Well worth the investment.

reviews.title: Excellent for over-sleepers!
reviews.review_text: Awesome alarm. reviews.title: Sonic Boom did not boom
reviews.review_text: I bought this for a present for my best friend. The alarm clock did not work so now I have to physically return it to the store, hence why I do online shopping.

reviews.title: when you need to wake up
reviews.review_text: Wow! it wakes the dead! it is great! If you can't hear your old alarm very well because you're deaf like me, you will hear this alarm. Try the buzzer/ viberater under your pillow, I'm sure that will work. Its well worth the money.

reviews.title: Wakes my ugly self up!
reviews.review_text: I have had this a few months now and I can honestly say it has woke me up every morning. I have sleep apnea and due to a car accident I have to take a lot of painkillers including Morphine and Percocet and they make me sleep very soundly with the sleep apnea machine. This thing cuts through the deep sleep and wakes me up every time. One of the nice features is that it allows you to adjust the tone and volume so I so mine to the loudest volume and the tone I find most annoying and coupled with the vibration unit it effectively wakes me up every day. If I had one complaint it would be that it should not have a snooze button on it, not a good thing for those that have a hard time getting up.

reviews.title: Good, but not great.
reviews.review_text: When I ordered this, I was so excited because I could not wake up in time for my first job. I work 7-11, go to school 12-3:30, then work 5-10:30, so I needed something that would kick me in the face at 6a.m. Needless to say, this clock did this until about 2 weeks in. After that, the pillow vibrator had become useless. My body just quit allowing it to affect me. Then the alarm stopped waking me up. I changed the tone of it in hopes that the reason behind my not waking up was the fact that my body had become custom to the sound. Unfortunately, this was not the case. Another downfall of the clock was the looks. The shape is ridiculous, and the colors are even more so. There is another one with the exact same specifications, with the exceptions of the looks, and it cost $10.00 more. I know I seem really negative in the review, but the clock is the loudest I have heard. 113db may be a stretch, but it is loud. I think the problem lies in my lifestyle, as opposed to the clock. However, I believe this clock was created for people in similar situations, i.e. moms that raise kids and work. Anyway, take this as you will.

reviews.title: So happy with the alarm clock
reviews.review_text: This is so wonderful my child has a vary hard time waking up and with the sound a vibrating opson were we can do both wored so grate to get her up. I stuck the vibration part under her fited sheet and put the alarm clock out of reach of her hands so she has to get up to turn it off. Normal alarm clocks never worked for her I'm so happy this duse. I'm planing to get one for me too becuse I'm losing my hearing and it will surely help me get up also!!

reviews.title: Very positive!
reviews.review_text: It was easy to set up and I am pleased with the alarm and the vibrating device. It works quite well under the pillow. Since my mattress is quite thick, I was unable to use it there. The alarm volume can be set at a VERY loud setting - amazing! I will never be late again!

reviews.title: Does Not Work - No Reliability
reviews.review_text: The purpose of an alarm clock is to wake you. This clock is loud enough, but it never works reliably enough that you can depend on it. After just 2 months the error codes started appearing. The clock would work sometimes but not every day as it should. I returned it for another one of the same model - same thing happened. This clock is a good concept - but it doesn't work. Do not buy this piece of junk.

reviews.title: Finally an alarm that works!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this alarm clock as a gift for my son who is a deep sleeper. He has slept thru hurricanes, multiple alarm clocks and cell phone calls, texts and alarms, nothing seemed to work to wake him. Till now. He said that it is the most annoying thing ever, and he jumps up out of bed to turn it off so that the neighbors do not mistake it for a fire alarm! LOL For him to says that it works great speaks for itself as he has tried many methods to wake up in the morning to no avail. Finally an alarm that gets the job done, don't hesitate to purchase this alarm clock if you or someone you love has difficulty waking to regular alarm clocks.

reviews.title: Problem solver for waking a deep sleeper!
reviews.review_text: My 10 year old daughter is a very deep sleeper. She is also hearing impaired in one ear. Therefore, regular alarm clocks don't always work when she needs to wake up for school. After using this alarm clock on only the vibrating alarm placed under her pillow (don't need the sound), it has worked amazing. A little pricey especially since it doesnt even have a radio included (there is one available that does but I couldnt justify paying $20 more for that option), but it does its job.

reviews.title: Great Vibrating alarm clock
reviews.review_text: This alarm clock really works. I have always had a hard time waking up and sometimes sleeping through other alarm clocks. I put it under my pillow and it shakes and vibrates so much that it definitely wakes me up. Very glad I bought this alarm clock.

reviews.title: This alarm is a good purchase.
reviews.review_text: This clock is VERY loud. However, I would not compare it to a jackhammer. I read a lot of discriptions and reviews before I bought it and I am the exception to the guareented to wake one up. "I CAN still sleep through the noise" even though the neighbors might be hearing it. I hear fine when I'm awake. I must sleep really deep. I actually thought it might be louder (that's why not 5 stars). I sleep next to a noisy window air conditioner and with the television on. What does wake me up and get me going is the bedshaker. I slip it into my pillowcase and that seems to do the trick for me. I thought the bedshaker would scare me awake but it isn't that radical or it may be the way I'm positioning it. This alarm is a good buy, well worth the money and the loudest I've ever heard. A little disappointed in the cheesy quality of the plastic (that's also why not 5 stars). It doesn't have a durable feel. That was the first thing I noticed when taking it out of the box besides the aweful plastic smell from the inside packaging. I hope it lasts a long while. Being able to adjust the tone is a great feature for me becuase if I get used to hearing the same noise morning after morning it tends to not disturb me after a while. This way I can change the pitch to mix it up a litte and keep it fresh.

reviews.title: I loooooooooove it!!!
reviews.review_text: The shipping was on time, AWESOME! I wake up fast once it vibrates, feels like an earthquake LOL! BTW, I'm deaf :) I don't have to wake up every hour during night time to check the time on my iPhone WHOO HOO!!! Even more, it has TWO alarm sets, PERFECT :) Again, I loooooooooove it!!! I'm a Wal-Mart freak haha!

Fabulous!!! I purchaased 2 clocks in a store that advertised them as "loud alarm". They were not loud for me. After research was referred to a truck stop that carried a model clock especially for truck drivers and purchased one. It proved to be effective in waking me, but a bit difficult to learn how to set it. This clock did not last one year and was back to the truck stop to purchase another, but was told they no longer carred this brand. The price was comparable to the Sonic Alert. How lucky am I to find this on line at Walmart!! After reading the details on all "loud alarm clocks", I chose the Sonic Alert Boom Alarm. I am absolutely thrilled with its performance. Since I am hard of hearing, must have a dependable clock. As yet, have not used the shaker because don't need it. The design and performance exceeds expectations, and the price is "icing on the cake". Don't hesitate about choosing the Sonic Alert!

reviews.title: BOOM
reviews.review_text: Got it for my wife,the vibrator wakes us both,with the volume set on low.I cannot imagine needing a more powerfull alarm.I was looking for a battery powered clock,but the back up fills our concern about loosing power during the night.All controls are EZ to see and locate when waking up,I like the large time display and use it for a night light.I would reccommend this clock to any hard to wake sleeper.

reviews.title: Deep Sleeper's Alarm Clock
reviews.review_text: The Sonic Boom Alarm Clock is great. I am a deep sleeper and can sleep through my cell phone alarm clock. I could have gotten a stereo system since they can be louder but this is cheaper and figure I would give this a try. It does help with the vibrations under my pillow. Almost sounds like a semi backing up with alert system and you can adjust the sound so it makes a faded or clear alert system. The vibrations are not very comfortable so don't worry about sleeping through the vibrations. You wake up instantly but you can easily fall back asleep from the snooze button. It comes back on so that is good. Haven't timed the snooze button yet. There is a button on the back that you can adjust that sets at (USA)12 hour at 60hz, (UK)12 hour 50hz, (Europe)24 hours at 50 hz. There are 4 adjustment settings on it. Buzz and or vibrate. High or low vibrations. Buzz sounds faded or not so faded. High or low buzz sounds. There is a square battery to put in the back to store the set times which will be great in the storms during summer. I plan on getting another one or two just in case they stop selling this. Don't forget AM or PM settings on it!!! lol

reviews.title: Great alarm clock for the deep sleeper
reviews.review_text: My son is 12 and would sleep through his alarm every morning. He had 2 alarms going off approx. 10 inches from his head and slept straight through it for a half hour till I woke him. 1st morning with the Sonic Boom and he was up right away and on time for school!! I would have never believed it if I hadn't seen it. I didn't think there was an alarm to wake him cause he is such a deep sleeper, but this does. Very pleased!!!

reviews.title: Deep Sleeper?
reviews.review_text: I am probably the deepest sleeper you can think of. I once slept through a hurricane, and thunder storms don't phase me. This alarm clock wakes me up EVERY time. Lights flash, the buzzer is loud enough, and the bed shakes. The ONLY drawback to this clock is the fact that the snooze bar only works for an hour. I am chronic about hitting that sucker, and one hour is not uncommon for me to hit it. The snooze deactivates after one hour. The only other improvements I would make from a design aspect would be 2 things. One, make the buzzer more like the sound of an emergency vehicle coming through, because that subconciously affects everybody. Two, I would have the bed shaker a revolving off center motor to be more effective and realistic for a wave effect. However, for the money, this is a VERY good alarm clock (only) and I highly recommend it for heavy sleepers.

reviews.title: It didn't work !
reviews.review_text: I ordered this purchase on line, paid by credit card, requested delivery to store (Whitinsville, Ma), waited one week for it's delivery to the store. -- The delivery and notification system went well. -I picked it up at the store when notified and brought it home. It was well-packaged. All of the required apparatus was present and in apparently good condition. It simply didn't work! I mean -it didn't ring, the vibrator didn't vibrate -- it didn't even light up. (Yes, it was plugged in and connected properly!) -- Unfortunately, I returned it to the store. I have a substantial hearing loss and had hoped that, at last, an alarm clock that was capable of waking me was available. --Unfortunately, that was not the case !

reviews.title: A godsend
reviews.review_text: Our son is a senior in high school and still could not get himself up in the morning. We tried several different alarm clocks but nothing seemed to work. I finally googled "extra loud alarm clocks" and quickly found that Sonic Alert was THE brand for deep sleepers. The Sonic Bomb is loud (claims 113db) and also has a disk to go under the mattress or pillow that vibrates very violently. Between the sound and the vibrating disk, he has gotten up on his own ever since we got it. I'm only sorry we didn't discover this product sooner, say when he was in middle school- would have saved many rough mornings in our house. Anyhow, he has it now, and we can send him off to college in the fall without having to worry about whether he'll get up for class or not.

reviews.title: This alarm clock will wake you up!
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my mother who is hard of hearing. It works fantastic! With the first shut off option, when Mom turns it off, it is still reset for the next morning. There are other options for vibrate, sound, two alarm choices and volume and tone control. It has a plug in plus the battery back up. And there is a vibrating pad to insert between the mattress and box spring, which is just another added way to wake the person who is hard of hearing. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone with hearing issues or is a deep sleeper. You will wake up!

reviews.title: This alarm REALLY WORKS
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my boyfriend, who used to just keep hitting snooze until he was thirty minutes late for work every day. Now, he's on time. He sets the vibrating disc on the headboard, where it scares him every morning. It vibrates off the headboard and onto the floor, but doesn't stop vibrating, and it is annoying and loud enough that he has to get up to get it. The actual alarm itself is also very loud, but I credit the disc with waking him up. If this can make him be on time for work, then it can work miracles.

reviews.title: Sonic Boom Alarm Clock
reviews.review_text: WOW - Flashing lights! Strong vibration! Even the deaf (which I am) couldn't sleep through this baby. I have been wanting one of these for a while and got this one at a good price on sale so couldn't be happier. Setting time/alarm, etc. is pretty intuitive and easy. Definitely can recommend.

I am very,very hard of hearing,but i still am employed and need to get up at a particular time each day.This alarm is unlike any i have owned before.It's vibration mode is fantastic and the alarm itself is extremely loud.I am actually going to buy another one for traveling.I have also recommended some friends to observe this alarm and they have also made a purchase.I only wish Walmart had them on the store shelves.

reviews.title: Great product for a sound sleeper! :)
reviews.review_text: Purchased this product for my son who recently moved out on his own. My husband has worried himself sick that he won't get up to go to work - he is a sound sleeper. Mom has not been worried! He has this product as his alarm clock. It is very loud and the vibrating unit is awesome. He puts it in the pillow cover which zips closed then puts a pillow case over that. This way it won't keep falling out. Works well! My younger son wants to know why he didn't get one, so I guess another SONIC BOOM will need to be ordered for a Christmas gift. I used SITE to STORE for this item. That is a great program and FREE shipping!

reviews.title: Sonic Boom Almost a Bust
reviews.review_text: Overpriced. The alarm output is very good as an alarm clocks go, but there are too many other gadgets that are completely unnecessary and probably increase the costs to this products determent. If the clock is placed on a platform away from the bed, the vibrator wire is strung out and dangerous to walking; it should be blue tooth. In fact there should be 2 editions of this product: a deluxe version with all the bells and whistles and a simple vanilla alarm clock with a loud sound.

reviews.title: It'll Wake The Dead
reviews.review_text: WOW... I wanted a loud alarm that is what the Sonic is. One guy here said it wasn't loud enough. It has a volume control. If he didn't have it turned down he needs to go see an ear doctor. So yes, it is loud, A keeper for me. However, there is a lot of not so good stuff, Like the shape. To set anything you have to pick it up to steady it, but the shape is awkward; slips out of your hand easily. However, it has lots of tricks like two alarms and they are 24 hour type, though not day settable. When the alarm sounds slap it on the top and shuts off for 7 minutes then back on. Even has a bed shaker! So, not so pretty, a bit clumsy to set, but it will wake the dead. Even has a tone adjustment so that while awake you can adjust the tone to the most disturbing for you. The time numbers are huge with adjustable brightness. The clock itself is a night light and its brightness is adjustable too. Any big flaw? Yep, if the electric goes off the time keeps working, but not its display and not the alarm. jimD

reviews.title: SUPER LOUD
reviews.review_text: test work great And you have to hold the clock button for you push fast or slow and that's how you set the clock but it's got to be on top position and you'll see a red dot in the PM section left top Display and and you won't see a Dot for AM. To set alarm you want to press buzzard and select alarm one for alarm to for your times. Hold alarm button press fast or slow on time and it will set to your time if you want to slow it down that's minute by minute that slow you want to go fast that's hour to 30min forward . They wanna go backwards So make sure that you see the PM in the left corner . It does have the 24 hour 12 hours settings But if you looking for something super loud you cannot wake up this is what you get

reviews.title: wish I had one sooner

reviews.title: love my sonic boom clock

reviews.title: Sonic Alert Vibrating Loud Alarm
reviews.review_text: My hearing has become progressively worse and my "old" alarm clock was not always waking me up, so I went shopping for a new clock. This clock gets me awake. I set the clock for alarm and for vibrate. Startled me awake it was set so loud1 The clock has a volume setting and I will play with it so that I might not need it that loud. I don't like to awake with my heart pounding :) The vibrate alone would wake me, I think. I will experiment with just using vibrate setting on days that I don't have to get up early to be somewhere on time.

reviews.title: Waker Upper

While waiting for its arrival he was concerned about oversleeping. This clock is working just fine. The vibrator doesn't disrupt the house compared to a loud alarm. He uses the beep/vibrate feature of the clock. Anyone who has a person struggling to get up, I would suggest this clock. It works.

reviews.title: Disc cord too short, I can reach snooze

It Definitely wakes me, but doing 38-42 hours in 3 days and still having Thursday and Friday to go, I hit snooze repetatively and wind up late. Think I might solve the problem by "hiding" the clock under my bed so I actually have to get OFF the bed to shut it off. Wish it came with a 10 or 15' disc cord. THAT would be 5 stars!!- Even if it was an optional "upgrade" to pay a little extra for, or a 10-15' cord as a separate purchase would give it 4.5 stars.

A warranty claim requires that you apply for a RMA, then you have to send back the entire product, plug, shaker and all back to the manufacturer and then the'll send you back a refurbished clock. If you enjoy being frustrated and late, this is the clock for you. If not, choose something else.

You can also program the duration of the alarm from one minute to 59 minutes, I purchased this alarm for my Mom who needs a hearing aid during daytime hours. Now I do not need to call her every morning and dial back numerous times to waken her.

reviews.title: Didn't work on a battery.
reviews.review_text: I ordered this item before the long Labor Day weekend, and was looking forward to being shaken awake tomorrow, as I have to wake up much earlier than usual. I took the clock out of the box, and the first thing I did was install a brand new 9V battery in the back. Nothing happened; it didn't turn on. While both the battery and the alarm clock were fresh out of their respective boxes, I did test the battery to make sure it was indeed fresh. It was, so I removed the cord from the box and plugged this alarm in to the outlet. It worked fine, but I immediately returned it to my local store because of the issue with the faulty battery connector. I do not know if I will order another one. I will wait and see.

When I went to bed a few hours later, the time was not what it should have been. Thinking it was my fault, I reset the time and went to bed. The alarm woke me over an hour early. Thinking maybe I could outsmart this irritating piece of subpar junk, I set alarm to compensate for the time it skipped the night before. It woke me up 20 minutes late. I have had this alarm for four days now and it CANNOT KEEP TIME. It's not even consistant with the time it skips. I've returned this and will be ordering something else.

reviews.title: Not impressed

This includes my husband, my 3 yr old and me. I don't know what to say I mean the vibration is pretty strong but I guess we just sleep too hard. The buzzer is supposedly this extremely loud, high decibel alert.....but I do not hear it. So if you are a hard, deep sleeper and you purchase this clock make sure you keep the box for a week or two and try it out first. I made the mistake of throwing mine out and now I am stuck with an overpriced clock that is very unattractive in appearance for my bedroom. Oh well.
